long_description: The REI Trekker Self-Inflating Sleeping Pad offers lightweight comfort for backpacking or camping. Horizontally cored foam is lightweight and compressible without compromising warmth. Quick-closing, high-flow valve helps you quickly inflate and deflate the pad. Brushed polyester upper surface is soft and slip-resistant; polyester bottom surface resists wear. R-value equals 5.6; most sleeping pads REI sells range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (highly insulated). The REI Trekker Self-Inflating Sleeping Pad includes a stuff sack and compression straps for easy storing and packing.
short_description: The REI Trekker Self-Inflating Sleeping Pad offers lightweight comfort for backpacking or camping.
